results.name: a(n) = A052126(n) * A006530(A052126(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..100000
program: (PARI) A322820(n) = if(isprime(n),1,if(1>=omega(n),n,my(f=factor(n), y=#f~); if(1==f[y,2], f[y,2] = 0; f[y-1,2]++); factorback(f)));
A064989(n) = {my(f); f = factor(n); if((n>1 && f[1,1]==2), f[1,2] = 0); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1)); factorback(f)};
xref: Cf. A000265, A006530, A052126, A070003 (positions where a(n) = n for n > 1), A122111, A319988, A322813, A322819, A322826 (restricted growth sequence transform).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 27 2018
